entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • On pasting code or reformatting, Visual Studio replaces tabs with spaces (can be undone with Ctrl Z) #64068
  • Move type to file copies parent class #64066
  • Quick Actions-Slider does not match the content #64065
  • VS Toolbar does not work when StackTraceExplorer has focus #64061
  • StackTraceExplorer ContextMenus icons not themed appropriately #64060
  • Erroneous CS8370 when using IntPtr comparison in C# 7.3 #64059
  • StackTaceExplorer does not handle VS Theme change #64058
  • `Change to direct cast` creates nullability warning #64052
  • `IDE0074` removes comments #64051
  • LSIF Generator can generate invalid JSON in hover results #64050
  • WorkCoordinatorTests.AdditionalDocumentOpenedClosedEvents is flaky #64047
    17.4
  • Incorrect ref escape analysis #64045
  • IDE0059 incorrectly suggests removal of used variable #64044
    17.4

Closed

  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp 4.3.0 fail to build source generators #63919
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32915.115 #64057
  • Error overriding a method with an implicitly scoped parameter with -langversion:10 #63761
    17.4
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #62340
    17.4
  • Sometimes a block of comment is not collapsable #64001
    Backlog
  • Shipped APIs files should include nullable annotations #40502
    Compiler.Next
  • Incorrect CS8618 warning for generic property with Enum constraint #64040

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove unused parameter #64070
    Area-IDE
  • Add test validating gotodef at end of file #64069
    Area-IDE
  • Add some additional data for bug investigation #64067
    Area-IDE
  • Consider types with ref fields as managed and Allow pointers of managed types in some contexts #64064
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix goto-def not working on the last character in a document #64063
    Area-IDE
  • See if the TextSpan can be removed from DiagnostiDataLocation. #64056
    Area-IDE
  • Use the source-built version of ref packs and don't use app host when building in source-build #64055
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a completion list filter for enum member #64054
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.3 to release/dev17.4 #64042
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Test Integration pipeline #64039
    Area-IDE
  • [EnC] Follow up on deleting properties and events etc. #64034
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Simplify the data model for DiagnosticDataLocation. #64053
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix possible race condition in AnalyzerConfigWithInferredIndentationOptions #62545
    Area-IDE, 17.4
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64062
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Small cleanup of symbol completion providers #64024
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow adding `scoped` or removing `[UnscopedRef]` for override, interface implementation, or delegate conversion #63656
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields, 17.4
  • Fix remote authoring #64048
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Use helpers to consistently navigate to symbols in features. #64014
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Cache results of reading SOurceText in SerializableSourceText #63980
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64049
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Use real data type for diagnostic location information #63946
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix CodeLens with top level functions #63999
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Support collapsing multi-line comments in any context #64023
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64041
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64043
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64038
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64036
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64035
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64037
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev16.11-vs-deps to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #64029
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.2 #64030
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1993724 #63994
  • Ignore ref-safe-to-escape of unscoped ref to ref struct in MAMM #64017
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64032
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Fix EnC test and assertion #64025
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next

Updated

  • Do not report an error and eat `scoped` identifier following `ref` keyword. #64021
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Disable quickinfo on new inline rename #63907
    Area-IDE
  • Improve diagnostic for returning scoped ref by reference #64027
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert To Record Refactoring/Code Fix initial offering #63654
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Records
  • Semantic snippets - Turn on experiment + turn off old snippets while new snippet experience is on #63991
    Area-IDE
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify project cache cleanup #63995
    Area-IDE
  • Check generic containing attribute types #64006
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't request frozen partial document for semantic tokens in proc #63984
    Area-IDE
  • Report static parameter type error (CS0721) on parameter type instead of method name #63975
    Area-Compilers
  • Add `ILocalSymbol.IsForEach` and `IsUsing` #64004
    Area-Compilers
  • Colorize langword inside doc comments #63900
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Emit [module: RefSafetyRules] attribute for all modules compiled with updated escape rules #63916
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Add ChecksumAlgorithm to project snapshot #62840
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Update Csc.cs #63976
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Deprecate usage of Workspace in TextLoader (breaking change) #63616
    Area-IDE, Needs API Review
  • Check method arguments must match for property accessors #63809
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Move test method to test code #64005
    Area-IDE
